name: Age Of Mechs
description:
2.5D Puzzle-Platformer with some swingin Action!

Controls:
     A/D  --  Move
     Space/W  --  Jump
     (hold)Right-Click  --  Aim
     Left-Click  --  Shoot/Hook
     Esc  -- Exit
     R  --  Restart Level
     O  --  Options

After Artificial Intelligence began to reproduce themselves and exist with their own will, a war between the humans and the new technology started. Most humans got eradicated and the machines were decimated too. The world itself continued as if nothing ever happened. Suddenly, in an abandoned factory used to produce those ancient machines, one of them awakes.

This Game was made for the Mech-Jam 3!!!
by a Team of 3:

Koperplyar  --  Programmer, 3D/VFX Artist, Leveldesigner
Petrol4brains  -- Adaptive Sound Designer and Composer
Cobaltus  --  Artist, Level-Decorator + supporting Leveldesigner
